requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: CHEM 150L is the first lab for students taking Chemistry at Emory. The lab focuses on experimental practices including experimental design, accuracy and precision, data collection and analysis, and the use of evidence to make conclusions. Experiments will connect structure to properties of matter.
prerequisites: CHEM 150 or equivalent transfer credit as co-requisite.
